subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Carlos Delgado’s 10-pitch at-bat against Michael Wuertz drew a walk and forced home José Reyes with the winning run Monday night as the Mets overcame a four-run deficit.
snippet: Carlos Delgado’s 10-pitch at-bat against Michael Wuertz drew a walk and forced home José Reyes with the winning run Monday night as the Mets overcame a four-run deficit.
